vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(caddress.call(id, from, _tos[i], v), "Low level call failed");
vulnerability_findings.message:
airdrop.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool,string)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v),Low level call failed) (patch_4.sol#13)

low-level-calls

	-require(bool,string)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v),Low level call failed) patch_4.sol#13

naming-convention
